"He won't touch her, you have my honor word Aerotaur" said Windlord 
and he moved where Nighlight was


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Windlord.  Take care of Nightlight for the moment.  I will 
make him pay 
> for what he did to her!"  He turns to glare at Clash.  "You know 
nothing of 
> honor.  As for me I was honorable by protecting Nightlight.  Now, 
are you 
> ready to die?"
